Title/Description: Cultural norms and willingness to change diets
Notes: Draws on FAO cultural food heritage reports, Pew surveys, and anthropological sources.
Compiled from Pew Research (2021), FAO foodways, and regional ethnographies.

Title/Description: Institutional positions and political economy risks
Notes: Incorporates OpenSecrets lobbying data, EU CAP summaries, and FAO positions on transitions.

Title/Description: Food institution positions and influence levels
Notes: Categorized positions and lobbying metrics from FAO, USDA, EC, Brazil MAPA.

Title/Description: Legal and policy constraints on plant-based systems
Notes: Synthesized from FAOLEX, WTO agreements, and national food labeling statutes.

Title/Description: Subsidy distribution and labeling restrictions by country
Notes: Constructed using WTO subsidy notifications and FAO legal analysis.

Title/Description: Framing effects and trust in food communication
Notes: Based on IPES-Food framing studies, global trust surveys, and media content analysis.

Notes: Aggregated from global survey data and communication effectiveness literature.
